Class LdapPerson

java.lang.Object
  au.edu.anu.metadatastores.ldap.LdapPerson

public class LdapPerson
extends Object

LdapPerson

The Australian National University

Class that stores information about a person that has been retrieved from ldap

Author:
Genevieve Turner
